formalpara.title: Figure 5. Overall distribution of protein families among genes
formalpara.para: Both InterPro and NCBI (KOG/TWOG/LSE) families are shown. There is significant overlap, but the NCBI families are more extensive. A fifth of C. elegans genes encode nematode-specific protein families (LSEs) of various types, while another fifth are not easily identifiable by homology.
